class_notes:
Online with synchronous sessions - Zoom.
The first meeting date will be the week of January 25th.


Undergraduate students must send email to nursingregistrar@emory.edu for permission number to self-register.
course_description: Students will analyze the historical and structural factors which have led to the creation of racial disparities in American health care. Students will engage with historical scholarship and evidence in order to analyze the issues that continue to cause disparities today.
sections: Class Nbr: 3824, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: F 1-2:50p, Instructor: K. Smith, Status: Open
